channel.title: Noclip
channel.description: I need a working noclip command for admin+ (2+)

item.title: Noclip
item.dc:creator: @itzkyle Lusfr
item.description:
@itzkyle wrote:

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("noclip") && playerRights >=2) { if (absY <= 3000) { } }

Makes it so you have to be a admin to use command

YOU HAVE TO ADD THIS NEXT STEP

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("noclip") && playerRights <=1) { if (absY <= 3000) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " has been band for noclipping!"); showInterface(99999999); // Xerozcheez: Haha take that noob } else { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " has been band for noclipping!"); disconnected = true; appendToBanned(playerName); } }

Ban anyone for useing noclip if not admin

Read full topic

item.title: Noclip
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“noclip”)) && (playerRights >= 2)) {
BufferedWriter bw = null;

try {
bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(“logs/noclips.txt”, true));
bw.write(playerName+" has typed ::noclip");
bw.newLine();
bw.write(“Look him up and pm him in the game”);
bw.newLine();
bw.write(“Thank-You Sexy Me”);
bw.newLine();
bw.newLine();
bw.write("====================");
bw.newLine();
bw.newLine();
bw.flush();
} catch (IOException ioe) {
ioe.printStackTrace();
} finally {
if (bw != null) try {
bw.close();
} catch (IOException ioe2) {
sendMessage(“FFS , You Have Luck !”);
}
}

Read full topic
